content.rendered:
Programming designed for you.

Invest in your career with events, education courses and training from CAGBC experts. We offer programs that can help expand your knowledge of the green building sector and further your career and professional development.  

Introducing the new CAGBC Learning Hub 

We are pleased to announce the launch of the new CAGBC Learning Hub. Learning Hub is automatically linked with your MyCAGBC account. Your linked account will be set up after you make your first on-demand course purchase from our course catalogue. From that time forward, you’ll have only one account for both MyCAGBC and the CAGBC Learning Hub.

Click here to get more details.

Take a course

Choose from CAGBC’s on-demand and live courses to build on your green building expertise.

Attend an event

CAGBC regularly hosts events on the topics and issues shaping the future of green building. Check out the schedule.

Earn LEED credentials

A LEED credential demonstrates proficiency in sustainable design, construction and operations. 

Pursuing your LEED GA credential? Prepare for the exam with our Kickstarter courses.

Let’s Prep

Take courses for your LEED hours

Register
